page.title: 09 Farming(3)
page.content: The third and last farmer we interviewed also works very long hours.He enjoys his work but not sometimes in the winter when it is wet and cold.His farm is 450 acres and is purely dairy. When asked about changes in farming in the last twenty years he said it is now much more mechanised,therefore fewer workers are required.Farming has become more intensive with a greater number of animals per acre.Most farms have changed to silage for feed in winter instead of hay as it is easier to make. Agricultural fertilisers are considered to be very important because of the intensive nature of modern farming.
